channel.title: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*
channel.description:
[u][i][b]Server Home:[/b][/i][/u]
This is where I want to spawn upon death, and joining upon the server.
public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 3093; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3493; public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3093; // when dead respawn here public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3493;
Which is edgeville,
Works perfectly, but When I click the home tele, it takes me back to the old home, any news? I've tried searching almost all .java files i can think, unless its client sided.
[u][i][b]Crowns:[/b][/i][/u] I have added in-game Ranks, but there is no sprites for crowns at all, I do have crowns I wish to use, I just don't know how to implement them. Any guides?
[u][i][b]My .JAR Client[/b][/i][/u]
I made my jar, but the only problem is, it won't open.
This consists of one of two problems (From what YouTube) has told me.
1) It's not signed, but I'm pretty sure its signed because I did every step.
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/27xp6ar.png[/img]
Any Clues?

item.title: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Don’t use spaces in the name… Edit the jar name to Universal_Economy.jar
and then right click the bat, edit it, and change the “Universal Economy.jar” to “Universal_Economy.jar”. ad run it again

Read full topic
item.source: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*

item.title: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*

item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Have you tried compiling your server…?

item.source: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*

item.title: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*
item.dc:creator: @Vexi Vexi
item.description:
@Vexi wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:548870”]The home button issue is going to be in ClickingButtons.java.
Look for the ID like “4151” I believe…
That’s your home teleport button ID, and the coords in the teleport are where it’s taking you.
Change it to Config.START_LOCATION_X and Config.START_LOCATION_Y… importing Config if needed.

Crowns:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/348186-renamed-adding-custom-crowns-detailed-all-chat-types-rewritten-conventi.html

Client: When you JAR it, click the button to make a .bat file. When it’s done, run it using the .bat
It will print any errors.
Report the errors here.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*

item.title: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The home button issue is going to be in ClickingButtons.java.
Look for the ID like “4151” I believe…
That’s your home teleport button ID, and the coords in the teleport are where it’s taking you.
Change it to Config.START_LOCATION_X and Config.START_LOCATION_Y… importing Config if needed.

Crowns:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/348186-renamed-adding-custom-crowns-detailed-all-chat-types-rewritten-conventi.html

Client: When you JAR it, click the button to make a .bat file. When it’s done, run it using the .bat
It will print any errors.
Report the errors here.

Read full topic

item.title: A few things I cannot fingure out... *New Coder*
item.dc:creator: @Vexi Vexi
item.description:
@Vexi wrote:

Server Home:

This is where I want to spawn upon death, and joining upon the server.

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 3093; // start here
public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3493;
public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3093; // when dead respawn here
public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3493;

Which is edgeville,

Works perfectly, but When I click the home tele, it takes me back to the old home, any news? I’ve tried searching almost all .java files i can think, unless its client sided.

Crowns:
I have added in-game Ranks, but there is no sprites for crowns at all, I do have crowns I wish to use, I just don’t know how to implement them. Any guides?

My .JAR Client

I made my jar, but the only problem is, it won’t open.

This consists of one of two problems (From what YouTube) has told me.

  1. It’s not signed, but I’m pretty sure its signed because I did every step.

Any Clues?
